attributes.action: Stop pharmaceutical companies from price gouging life saving drugs.
attributes.background: Pharmaceutical companies have been outrageously marking up prices of life saving drugs for no apparent reason other than profiting off of people's illnesses. For example Turing Pharmaceutical marked up the price of Daraprim which can be used to treat aids by 5000% because it could.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
